name: Arclands Fan Contest Submission
description:
Interactive submission for the Arclands Fan Contest in a voxel art style.

+CONTROLS+

WASD to move, Mouse to look, and Space to Jump.

Arclands is currently on Kickstarter you can pledge here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jonkellerdev/arclands/

Jon Keller's Itch.io page can be found here:https://jonkeller.itch.io/arclands
